_sText:
1hp_classique
==================

Remake of the original 1hp map. I couldn't find an original remake which keeps the original structure as it is and just renew the design. So i thought something like this must be made and here it is. I do not have big ambitions with this map, it's just an simple remake. You should have Fun! =D

### Including:
- Knifes only
- Original, quadratic structure
- "Modern Source Design"
- HDR, Soundscapes, Radar, etc.
- **1HP ONLY!**

Have Fun =)
